title: PGP8.0.2+crack
description:
PGP DESKTOP FOR WINDOWS 8.0.2, PGP Desktop is recommended for smaller
      groups  not requiring centralized installation or management support.
      PGP  Desktop  provides  trusted,  proven,  and scalable solutions for
      successful encryption security deployment at the desktop. PGP Desktop
      includes   everything   needed   for  complete  end-to-end  security,
      providing  secure  messaging  (PGP  Mail) and data storage (PGP Disk)
      solutions  to  simply  and easily secure data in transit and at rest.
      PGP  solutions  work  with  existing  key infrastructure investments,
      including  X.509-based PKIs. PGP products have developed a reputation
      for  excellence  based  on  high  technical  standards  and long-term
      practical user experience. Key Features of PGP products include:

      PGP Desktop includes support for PGPmail, PGPkeys, PGPtray, PGPdisk,
      and all email plugins -- the personal email plugins plus GroupWise,
